properties.entry: SELECT user_code, user_name, user_tier FROM tbl_all_users

SELECT AU.user_name, AU.user_tier, C.champion_name, M.total_games, M.winning_rate FROM tbl_all_users AS AU JOIN tbl_master_users AS M ON AU.user_code = M.user_code JOIN tbl_champions AS C ON M.champion_code = C.champion_code;
